name: Wild Wild Cards
description:
Wild Wild Cards is very simple Collectable Card Game.  Cards are balanced like in rock-paper-scissor games. There is no ultimate card - all cards have own strength and weakness.  Half of victory is made by building your deck against specific enemy.

The game is Online and required an internet connection. You can play just from the browser or download Mac or Win standalone client.

Any feedback are welcome!

Thank you!
